name: BioJulia
description: Fast, open, extensible software for bioinformatics and computational biology.

name: EcoJulia
description: Ecological research in the Julia language.

name: MagneticResonanceImaging
description: Collection of packages for MRI research and application (simulation, reconstruction and analysis).

name: JuliaGeo
description: Extensible and flexible tools for geospatial(raster and vector) analysis and science.

name: JuliaEpi
description: Open research community to develop an epidemiological modelling ecosystem written in Julia.

name: JuliaImageRecon
description: General purpose image reconstruction and computational imaging packages.

name: JuliaNeuroscience
description: Flexible neuroinformatics tools built on high performance computational tools.
